ygData.subject: Re: bash at level 8?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank God for that, I was in need of a secondary attack. After 2 days of using it, with only one training point put in, im up to 7 damage a bash. Not too
ygData.messageBody:
Thank God for that, I was in need of a secondary attack. After 2 days of
using it, with only one training point put in, im up to 7 damage a bash. Not
too shabby.
Hopefully double attack will drop too
-Dyce

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Guillaume Voizard [SMTP:gvoizard@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 1:57 PM

> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] bash at level 8?

> From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
